author's_name_(_зохиогч): AE LO GOGS SANG HU THUG THU MER GENG PAndI TA,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @008B (CES RJE BTZUN SGROL MA LA BRTEN NAS BU'I GA-YANG DGUGS RIN CHEN LCAGS KYU ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, DZA HA CHEN GUNG THOG THU PA THUS DNGUL GYI MAndAL KHA BTAGS DANG BCAS PAS 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES BSKUL BA'I NGOR, BU 'DOD PAS NI BU THOB GYUR ZHING ZHES PA GZHUNG YOD PA'I PHYIR, AE LO GOGS SANG HU THUG THU MER GENG PAndI TAS SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI AOR TE NI NOM CHI THO'ING KU SHRI SLOB DPON BLO BZANG RGYAL MCHOG GO , ,,)
